Class ModelViewer

    • sketchupblocks.gui.ModelViewer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugViewer

    public class ModelViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jacques Coetzee The model viewer class displays the current model being built by the user in a real-time 3D OpenGL window.
